description:
Ever keep sending the same collection of messages to the same sets of people? Organise your most common messages and recipients to send them with a few taps of the Pre, with no need to open the keyboard.

Quick Message allows you to define a small collection of people from your address book either individually or groups, combined with a collection of messages to quickly send common messages out. Define how large each list is to be, from between 3 to 15 users and messages. Add users straight from your contact list and maintain the mini lists how you choose. Deleting from the mini lists does not delete your contact. If you don't like the order, both the message list and the user/group lists can be changed.

Features: 

Maintain small list of common contact numbers from individuals in your contacts.
Maintain collections of contacts to send the same message to many recipients. 
Reset message list to default set, ready to go.
Multiple numbers per person if required.
List size adjustable for ease of use.
User defined list ordering. Default is last used.
Edit message before sending.
No need to select a message to send, simply type into the message field.
Call number from Quick Message instead of sending.
versionNote: If photo available when added to the list, will be shown on screen
